content.detailedDescription: I was just finished with a 4 mile run at the thomas b. davis ymca, when i glanced up to look at the stars. i noticed 4 dimly lit lights in the sky, that i at first took to be stars. i realized that they were too big to be stars and they were the wrong colors. they seemed to be grouped together in a cross-like pattern and the colors were white, green, red and orange. after watching them for several minutes, i also realized they were moving together in formation. in the 20 or so minutes i watched them, they moved approximatly 10 degrees north to south. i decided at this time to see if i could find some friends of mine, or maybe a police officer with a radar gun, at a coffe shop i frequented at this time. i had no luck, so returned to the track about 20 minutes later. the lights were still there, at approximatly the same height, but their orientation had changed. the white light was still in the lead but the 2 lights that had upper and lower of the cross were now switched, and after watching for another 20 minutes, the entire cluster was moving from south to north. nothing else of significance happened and i left, feeling sure the whole thing must have been some kind of atmosheric disturbance of some kind. it does seem to me that the next days news cast mentioned that other people in the area had also seen lights in the sky that night, although i cannot now find any evidence of this now.
content.summary: During  my knightly run on the ymca track, 4 different color orbs slowly moved across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was flying from chicago to la and while over the desert i was taking pictures of formations in the desert. i noticed three bright lights (we were at 34,000 feet) that hurt my eyes to look at. i grabbed my camera and began taking pictures of the two bright lights, the suddenly a smaller light next to them began flashing but not at a regular pulse (smaller light can be seen in image). when i got home and started looking at the details of the images, the timestamps were not what they sould have been for the images. where the lights were, there was nothing in that area for miles and miles as far as structures, houses, or any signs of life and they were down in an area where they wouldnt have been seen from the ground because there were desert walls all around it. i could make out some type of image just on the edges of the light, and it looked like a metalic grey. the little light was to the right of the middle big light and it began blinking after i started taking pictures, but it wasnt a steady blink, it would blink...Blink blink...Blink blink blink...Blink blink, so it wasnt random. my first thought was ufos as i kinda laughed it off and figured it was government stuff. looking directly at the bright lights hurt my eyes like looking at the sun even at 34,000 feet. i said something to the lady next to me and she just said she was wonder what they were too.
content.summary: Flying over desert area and looked out plane window and seen blinding lights

content.detailedDescription: When the sighting occurred, i was flying with my father in our single engine airplane and an instructor giving my father a check ride. we were flying inland a quarter mile from the shore of the atlantic ocean. when i looked at the ocean, i noticed six orange glowing orbes hovering over the ocean. the first set of orbes stayed stationary and then fell towards the ocean surface before disappearing. the second set of orbes appeared suddenly and then disappeared without any motion such as falling like the first set. i considered the orbes flares being shot from a fighter jet. i later found out that there was a fighter jet off the coast in a training session. even though that seemed possible for the set of orbes that fell towards ocean, the second set of orbes is what made me wonder. they did not fall but stayed absolutely stationary before disappearing into thin air. my reaction was to remain calm and alert my father and the instructor. my father couldn't look because he was busy with the flight controls, but the instructor also saw the orbes. we had no earthly clue what we were witnessing. we lost sight of the last set of objects objects when they suddenly disappeared.
content.summary: First set of orange orbe hovered over atlantic ocean and then fell to the ocean with no splash or impact into the ocean surface from my viewing point.The second set of six orbes hovered over the ocean and then suddenly disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: a lightning strike had developed a conical or other light next to the strike
content.summary: Kamloops lightning strike

content.detailedDescription:
The 2 lights where on the sky, i first noticed it about 21:00 european time. about 22:00 it moved on the sky, both simultanius.
the 1 light is very bright, the other one bit stronger than the north star. the brighter light also pulsed. the light got from strong to low and strong. i didnt make any pictures but my friend and family, i also saw this lights at your site allready posted.
content.summary: 2 lights on the sky, 1 very bright, the other less, very strange, doesnt move in any direction, the stronger , later both moved position simultanius

content.detailedDescription: Taking pictures of the lightning storm in kamloops bc and found this strange bluish anomaly
content.summary: Cylindrical area surrounding lightning strike

content.detailedDescription:
I have submitted this before and received little help and was asked stupid questions and then no longer heard from mufon. 

i spoke to dan akroyd at one of his signings and he said that i should contact john ventre about this and that is what i am doing. i ask for an appointment with mr. ventre at his earliest convenience.
content.summary: Bright light and then object appeared in camera although i did not see it

content.detailedDescription: I was visiting florida east coast during march break back in 1970 when i witnessed a spacecraft suddenly appear a hundred feet from the shore when i was walking in the beach at 10 o'clock at night with my friend we had just arrived by winnebago from ontario canada for march break we witnessed this craft hover over the water the lights were so intense that when they crossed our path we could only see our bone structure when we looked upon each other this craft hovered for some time and then it shot out to sea under the water towards the bermuda triangle when my friend and i return to the winnebago where his parents were waiting my friend's mother started to scream and cry because we were both burnt red through our clothes and she applied noxema to us the whole time saying she promised my mother that she would keep sunscreen on me while i was in the sun we had not being in the sun for two and a half days driving in a winnebago we also thought we were gone for 20 to 30 minutes and we have been gone for an hour and a half i have been reluctant to share the story for many years but after seeing some shows on tv from mufon i decided that i would share my experience it has changed my life in many ways
content.summary: I observed a ufo suddenly appear a hundred feet off the beach near palm beach when i was there on march break i observe this craft submerge into the ocean and leave a light trail as it shot out to see under the water

content.detailedDescription: Me, my new wife, and mother outside of mothers home in dark clear sky saw two disc. objects hovering at a very high distance above the ground (miles high) then they first one then the other at a high rate of speed exited into deep space in the direction of a reverse capital j. the objects were large in size (dime size) and when they exited into deep space they went so fast that they went from their full size to a pin dot in about 2 seconds. this was all very real to all three of us and made us true believers that there is other beings than just on earth. the action and movement of these objects were way beyond human capacity.
content.summary: Hovered together then made move in reverse capital j and off into a pin dot into space at unhuman speed and disapeared

content.detailedDescription:
Was laying on the ground watching the sky with a friend. light approaches from se of big dipper moving fast. it stopped east of the big dipper and flashed 3 times and a dimmer flash, flashed next to the object i watched approached. 
i also seen a light as bright as the north star traveling south at a steady speed that me and my friend witnessed and as i was pointing it out to her we both watched the light dim down at a slow pace till it was faint but was able to still watch it counting in its path (weird).

 i just would like to have someone contact me from mufon. my first encounter was around 2010 in eaglecrest, or, when a larger triangle craft (had to be like 2 football fields long) and appeared to look like it was cloaking but the outline was clear as day cruised directly over me n my wife while on vacation quietly with a airplane nearby that we could hear..  if we wasn't looking up we would have never even seen it. it took me a day to report to the police because it was unbelievable but yes both occasions i do have witnesses that can vouch and that report i made. but to this day my wife still doesn't like to talk about it because she thinks people going think she's crazy smh but she admits to seeing it (she ran in the house and slammed the door close on me leaving me outside alone because it scared her that much). sorry for going on and on but this is my first time on y'all site and i'm personally tired of living in the dark when i know and have seen for myself that there are things alot bigger than what we know as life go in on.  plz respond back
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Watched it travel north, stopped left of big dipper, flashed 3 times and a lighter flash next to the brighter one then no longer viewable

cheers, 
20775
content.summary: Large star-like object while on vacation in colorado

content.detailedDescription:
I had left the house and was placing items into my car when i spotted the object through a gap in the trees. it had a star like appearance and was moving slowly on an approximate south to north path approximately 35 degrees above the horizon. it had the same approximate brightness as a nearby star which i believe to have been jupiter. i mistook it for the iss as first but realized that the object was accelerating. i lost sight of the object very quickly behind the treeline.
a few seconds later i observed what appeared to be a commercial flight appearing above the lowest part of the treeline just behind the house to the east, as it took off from the nearby airport. it was coming directly toward me and i could clearly see the landing lights, then a few seconds later the navigation lights were visible, very distinct from any characteristics of the object that caught my attention. the aircraft passed directly in the overhead and as i looked back to the gap in the treeline the object reappeared from behind the trees moving north to south this time, straight and level. i immediately took my cellphone from my pocket and began to record. by the time i had gotten the phone ready, the object had travelled across my sight line almost behind the trees on the left but it stopped and hovered, then descended with a zig zag motion, until it disappeared from sight behind the trees again. i watched the immediate area for about another 5 minutes but was not able to reacquire the object. there was no sound that i could immediately associate with the object and its maneuvering during the sighting.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star like object. bright, unwavering, exhibiting some non ballistic motion.

content.detailedDescription: As i crossed america from pennsylvania,somewhere on a long 2 lane straight highway thru a dessert mountain range"im not sure if it was wyoming or great salt lakes.A us govt.Lic.Plate and car passed me about 100 miles an hr.And there was a very large head very large eye big alien and looked and waved at me.I was in shock and coulnt believe what i just saw.When i ended up on the docks of saulsilito ca.To start building a house boat on dock 6.Approx.2 months went buy when i was awoken in middle of night by this invisible force and alien feeling of an encounter.It sounded like a computer or a walkie talkie bleep then somehow answered what has been on my mind and curiosity of other space crafts or other building craft type of thinking."i cant remember all the details"there was something invisible right there in my van with me and comforted me i was not scared.Before this i was for years being held down and frozen like i couldn't move when woken up in middle of night.The only words i remember it telling me was along the lines of "we had crafts before time" then beep beep like a robotic sound.I never again felt like i was being held down and couldn't move.Ever.After this encounter i became highly superior when it comes to building and fixing and creating.My life has changed because of this friendly visit.Now i have this really rare form of bone malfunction non life threatning form of bone cancer in my r.Humerous and theres no cure.This is the side the invisible but presence thing was.There is no known reason or cure of this monostotic fibrous dysplasia,but i always wondered if the entity had something to do with it.Even though it meant no harm and wanted me to know about things and taught me many skills.Thats all i remember and will till the day i meet my entity.Very sincerely john mohler.
content.summary: No sighting,awoken and was spoken to,all i remember is we had crafts before time,my life was changed,and i have special abilitys of creating perpetual and artistic crafts.

content.detailedDescription: Got an extremely fast ufo fly over. have seen many meteors, planes and satellites and none are like this. seen many micro and small meteors and they are a very fast flash or leave a trail. this was different enough to be worthy of a report, played in slow motion has a slight wobble. you can also watch frame by frame. thanks.
content.summary: Exceptionally fast ufo very short video

content.detailedDescription:
As i was moving my garbage can for pick-up in the morning, around 9:10 p. m., i noticed two bright lights in the sky, the upper one dimmer than the lower.  momentarily, i thought the objects could be helicopters with bright lights on, but quickly realized that they could not be. the lights looked elongated almost as if they were in two sections, with light emanating from each section.  
the lights appeared to have moved slightly during the approximately 25 minute long viewing, as i had to reposition myself periodically to keep them in view above the mountain.  i eventually lost the ability to view the lower one at all.
after losing sight of the lower object, i decided not continue observing and returned to my home.
my observations lead me to believe that i was observing the same two light that were observed from santa margarita in orange county.
content.summary: My wife & i observed these lights from near big sur for about 25 minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
I will start off by mentioning i was 7-8 years old. i do not know the exact year this happened. either 1962 or early 1963. (i was only a kid)
we (my family) just moved into a new house in vienna, va. (1962)
being this was a new house and surroundings to me, i was very unfamiliar to the house and yard. i do know i had yet never been in my own backyard. and had no idea what it looked like or its surroundings.
i shared a bedroom with my two brothers. they slept in a bunk bed while i had my own bed.
the head of my bed was up against the wall which also had a window looking out into our back yard.
everyone was asleep, and i do not have a clue as to what time it was. all i know is us kids were in bed for the night.
something made me wake up. i remember the room was bright. for whatever reason i wanted/had to look out the window. to this day i wonder why i looked out the window.
there were three what looked to be people in my back yard. the whole area was a very bright white. it was like it was in the middle of the day brightness. these entity's reminded me of a family. there was two tall ones, i'm guessing maybe 4 feet tall, and a smaller one. the smaller one was in the middle, and i am pretty sure the two tall ones were holding hands
with the smaller one. i know they were looking at me. i don't recall seeing their noses, necks, any hair or even mouths. it is like their heads just blended into the body. they were a grayish white. no clothes, and nothing to reveal if they were male or female. just all grayish whiteness except for their eyes which were very dark and the almond shape as it is described now a days.
as weird as it sounds i felt like something was telling me it was ok and not to be scared. and i wasn't scared, and looking back it was very peaceful. they just continued to stare at me. again recalling how i felt very safe and like they were friends. it was a feeling and knowledge from within i am having a hard time explaining.
in the short amount of time i was actually looking out the window, i saw my back yard for the first time. it was all lit up like daylight. i saw a few bushes and trees. i even saw a shiny structure to the right of them about 15 feet. it went straight up is all i knew at that time. turns out it was a neighbors antenna tower. he was an amateur radio operator i found out years later.
close to the base of this tower but in front of it it was as white/grayish as can be, and i think i saw a structure, and i do recall it appeared to be a saucer shape. but i am not sure of this as i was more interested in these three entity's and it was very bright and hard to look at the saucer "thing". i recall it was hard not to continue looking at the three of them.
i know i am repeating myself but i felt very at ease and safe, and because of this(?) i dropped back down into my bed and fell right back to sleep.
this is something else in all these years i have wondered why i just went back to sleep instead of continuing to watch what was in my back yard.

weeks/days(?) later, settled in to a new house, i eventually ventured out for the first time into my new back yard. it was like i already knew what to expect in seeing. the same trees, bushes, layout, and yes the antenna tower was all there just as i saw it when i was looking out my window at the three i call friends.
the most amazing thing about it is there is an indentation in the ground and round in shape where i saw this saucer grayish thing.

not many people i have told this to. i have talked to my family a few times about it, and a few close friends. one of my brothers says he remembers that night, but i have a hard time believing it because i don't recall him being awake, but then again, i don't recall looking in my room while all this was happening. so i wouldn't know if anyone else was awake or not.

i find this incident really weird and strange as years go by. i know what i saw. and being the age that i was at that time, i don't recall watching cartoons or tv shows that showed these "little gray men" with almond shaped eyes, no mouth, no neck, etc. i know i didn't read books about it...So i am left knowing what i saw, and now seeing tv shows etc. about this stuff, and everyone in them describing exactly what i saw. it's amazing and baffling at the same time. sometimes i wonder if i was dreaming it. but on the other hand, how can i dream of something i know nothing about? 
i remember being at peace and feeling like they were friends (only way i can describe it). it was a strong feeling. (and still is)
content.summary: Sighting of three entity's and what appeared to be a small craft

content.detailedDescription: Ok so i shot this in slo mo on iphone6 i was filming raindrops as soon as it goes to slo mo something shoots across screen fast but iam in slo mo so i can't explain it. it can't be a bird i filmed slo mo birds and they don't move that fast
content.summary: Object zipping by but filmed at n slo mo

content.detailedDescription: In sturgeon bay door county on a lake near town on our family lakehouse my stepbrother and i were having an outside fire at about 2 in the morning when i saw an odd looking star in the sky that appeared to be shining oddly. i said something to the effect of what the hell? and walked over to get a closer look as my stepbrother started to make fun me...At first! then he started to notice that the "star" was kind of hovering oddly and moving like a shaking sphere kind of erratic movements. i then noticed that for a fraction of a second something was expelled that appeared to be shimmering in the same way that the ufo was but the light from it stopped very quickly. anyway, it probably lasted under 5 minutes, id estimate 3-5 minutes, and it seemed to just quickly fade away in a period of about 3-5 seconds. anyhow, i'm not the most specific in my report about the directions and such but just wanted to report this
content.summary: Saw ufo wavering around and moving oddly, saw it expel something that was lit up similar to the way the craft was looking, but which then (the expelled material) seemed to stopglowing afterjust a millisecond after it was expelled

content.detailedDescription:
Just sat down in my driveway and observed halo around the moon.
then saw white/ blue dot bouncing in all directions.
not an orbiting thing!
it went close to moon then bounced to another north?
then west?
got ipad pics for proof.
how can i send them to mufon?
saw similar stationary blue orb years ago over my house in malibu,ca.
ran home got my camera but it was gone!
i'm still going to observe haloed moon to see if odd light reappears!
content.summary: Watching halo around moon

content.detailedDescription: I was in the back of my girlfriends pickup truck her and my mom went to the home depot to get some split rail fencing in florence ky after they bought the fencing they stopped by our apartment to see if i wanted to ride back to take mom back home and help unload the fence posts so i went and i sat in the back of the truck on the fence posts it didnt have a truck cap on it well we were close to my hometown of milan indiana right at the dearborn ripley county line and we were driving straight into the sun i was turned to the left of the truck with my head kinda down and something wierd started hittin my eyes like a mirror reflecting light in my eyes and it happened 2 or 3 times before i looked up and i seen this small silver metallic object and it was hovering about a little over a quarter mile away and maybe 500ft up if it was that high and my mind drew a blank im saying to myself what is that the furthest thing in my mind was thinking it was a ufo my mind was blank well it started to turn counter clockwise very very slowly and it had a window to it or something like that so i watched it for aminute or more thinking what is that thing so i knocked on the glass and got mom's attention and pointed at the thing and said mom what is that and i read moms lips and she said thats a ufo then it hit me oh my god that is a ufo and im still pointing at it and that window part of it came back around and it knew i was pointing at it and this thing came down on me quick it was about maybe 200 ft away and i would say 100 ft high it had a wierd movement to it and it was about 30 ft around it looked like a silver teapot without the spout or handle i fly back into the corner of the truck and scream then when it stopped for a second then shot straight up like a bullet not a cloud inthe sky a blue sky i watched it till it vanished i got really bad vibes from that thing it knew i was pointing at it it scared the livin daylights out of me it was like it was sayin i been buzzing around and your the only one that has seen me it was wierd it had such a wierd movement when it came down on me but when it shot straight up it shot up like a bullet no wierd movement this is the lords truth this happened i have often wondered what it was if mankind can make something like that there holding back
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Seen small silver ufo in my hometown

content.detailedDescription: I first noticed the 2 light objects while walking at approx 9:00 pm in trabuco canyon ca. i called my wife who was driving to store, she also obs the objects. when i returned to my home the light objects moved slightly n/w from the originl sighting. the span was over 30 minutes. the spacing between the 2 lights did not change. still brighter on bottom and smaller on top at eleven oclock. over the the next 30 mins i lost sight due to elevation and home roofs.
content.summary: 2 lights, brighter and larger light on bottom,  smaller dimmer light slightly above brighter light at its eleven oclock

content.detailedDescription: I saw 9 craft fly across the sky  in formation flying in 2s  they were glowing red-orange as if they were on fire   they were not balls of light even though i couldn't see the craft i knew it was one   they disappeared at the sane point in the sky aa if there was a portal  i also could tell they were flying under radar   the area where i saw them  i have a good view  of a large sky i see planes from 2 airports coming and going this is a hotspot for ufo s
content.summary: Saw 9 craft  glowing as if to be on fire

content.detailedDescription: I was in the house and my wife was leaving. itbwas 9:45 p.M. she was heading to walmart to get fabric for our daughters blanket she is making. she is a non believer i am a believer, she ran into the house and said there's a ufo there's a ufo get out here. i ran outside and observed 2 lights in the air changing colors. the moon was bright and we could see the bigger ufo on bottom was hovering at an angle. the larger was on bottom the smaller on top. both were pulsating light and the light was changing color. the little one on top let off a streak of light that the best way i can describe it is it looked like a peace sign without the circle and it disappeared. the bigger one continued to stay there and we could see the body of the bigger craft now as the colors still changed. the little craft appeared again with no sound. the little ufo was around the outer of the big on and it looked like they may of joined together or were just hovering in a formation. an airplane did fly toward it and there is an army base about 20 miles away. that is when the smaller one disappeared. i wanted to videotape the incident but being in awe of this i did not want to miss this. as well as nybwife was terrified. the dogs in the neighborhood were also barking outside and the air felt charged like a lightning storm. this was not an airplane or helicopter. it almost had the color of a jellyfish in the sky when it wasn't changing colors. my wife and i will gladly take polygraphs on our statements. it made no sound, left no lights upon disappearing and when it left it looked more like it burnt out rather than take off. after it left another airplane headed that way but from a different direction.
content.summary: My wife and i observed two saucer looking ufos one bigger and one smaller hovering and changing colors for 15 minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
Dear sirs/madams,

   i am writing to you tonight regarding a recent photo taken during a dusk sky on 6/29/2015
. she has a very nice camera and she is learning it inside and out. however, this time you have to help us out. she was taking succession pictures of venus and jupiter as they are nearing one another to create the super star. she turned in the other direction to take some pics of the moon and the colorful sky and left the camera on continuous mode. while reviewing the pics we noticed that one of them had 3 bright lights all in a row. these lights were not seen in the sky by either of us nor by any of our three kids who were out at the time. i told my wife it was likely a glare or made by the flash or something. we looked at the pics before and after in the succession and none of them had the lights in it as would be expected if it were a glare. i was stunned enough to sit down and write this to you though i am a huge skeptic of this sort of thing. i'm figuring that there is a simple answer to this conundrum and am hoping you can clear it up for me. 

thanks in advance for your time and attention on this matter.

respectfully,

robbie & teresa harris
content.summary: Taking pictures and in the middle of them one pic has some glowing lights. none before none after.

content.detailedDescription: Never seen anything like it in my life saw mothership and five different ufo
content.summary: Seen about 5 ufo, and it circle us 15 times

content.detailedDescription:
Shooting the sun

monday june 22, 2015 at 7:08 p.M. i was in a parking lot wondering about what the effects would be if i shot my phone camera at the sun to take some video.  i had previously thought i had seen something while doing this a few days earlier.  

i shot a video that lasted 19 seconds and was aimed directly at the sun which was at 287° or wnw at an altitude of 16°.   i noticed an interesting sphere within what appears to be a field.   at first i thought all i was seeing was some type of reflection, but the odd thing was that i noticed in many of the frames that lights were on the surface of the sphere.  as can be seen in frames 1:54, 4:11, and 11:44 those lights are in different positions in each frame, as if it were rotating.

if this had been a reflection, the image should have been a duplicate of the sun, only dimmer and smaller.  instead, the character is such that sphere images are different.  at times, when the sun was moving up in the frame, the sphere moved down and behind a tree.  clearly it had its own movement that was independent.

i noticed other faint movements in the video frames, but they are very faint.  they also last for just one frame.  most were too difficult to get any decent resolution.  however, frame 15:54 had an image that was able to be edited and enlarged to make it viewable.

there was also another frame at 6:30 in which a spot of white appeared in the far right and middle of the image which also was enlarged to be more readily seen.  the light which appeared due to the camera’s shuttering down with the sun’s brightness allowed more detail to be seen and more clarity in what the nature of the object is in frame 6:30.
                                                                                                                                                                    
curious about the direction and what lay in the direction of the sun, i checked and discovered that the craft was directly over the most westerward of the lakewood lakes, precisely over the middle of the lake.   (see report about jupiter-venus fly-by).   two weeks earlier on june 8th, other craft were observed which seem to come from the same general location as well.

the distance this time is 1.25 miles to the center of the lake from my vantage point in the parking lot.  for background information, the image of the location of the june 8th sighting is included as well.

summary:
1.	a sphere entered my videotaping of the sun.
2.	the nature of the sphere is that it seemed to be spinning.
3.	the sphere had independent movement.
4.	other craft were seen as well, though much smaller.
5.	the location being identical in the lake is not coincidental since both the sun and venus are on the ecliptic plane as well as all planets but pluto.  what is new is the fact that more craft were seen over lakewood lake.  this makes the 2nd time that lakewood lakes seem to have craft associated with it.
content.summary: Shooting the sun

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving north on alamitos ave i had just passed ocean when i saw a woman pointing toward the sky, i glanced and saw one light, i made a left hand turn on 1st street and parked on the right side of the street, where i looked toward the nw where i observed two lights sitting in the sky! i took out my binoculors and could clearly see the lights, shortly a plane flew underneath the lights, i checked my watch and it was about 8:30, i snapped a picture of the light which was still sitting there, i than left and continued home. i looked again and they were still there at 9:00p
i do have the pictures of the light,the picture i have is of only the one which was the brightest.
content.summary: Bright lights sitting stationary in the sky not moving plane flew beneath objects

content.detailedDescription:
As many other mornings before being taken off to school, in the city, my brother and i where tasked to walk a distance from the residence in the (finca) farm, where we where growing up along with my mother and her second husband, the walk normally took us no more than minutes to get from the house to the car gate, there was a concrete pillar on one side that was used for looping a heavy chain with a heavy master built padlock, we kept 3 doberman pincher dogs, for protection and companionship, none that came to greet us or escort us as they usually did (trained), this one time, i remember the air being heavy to breathe as my brother and i approached the gate, we did so without even noticing the orb, as if it was not there, the first we noticed the thing, it was already there, as if it had been there all along, at least it is the feeling i'v had every time i recall that morning, my brother reacted like a flurry, first it was surprise, an expression of startle, then his movements became fractioned to my field of vision, as if he was moving so fast that my eyes could barely register at frames per seccond, like a hummingbird, i was turning to see what he was doing, when i turned, feeling what i can only describe now as an adult as some kind of fractioned time spurts like a badly working high speed shutter, i turned and i saw a creature of pure beauty and symmetrical endowed perfection, the image that later in my teens would become my ideal image of a woman. the only human i have ever seen with nearly identical features is the actress liv tyler, tho her hair was longer and wavy, thin, yet obedient, wore a seamless suit, not skin tight, but form fitting, her voice came to me clearer than sound, as if to my mind instead, it was soft, and delight is the only way to describe my memory of her, maybe what he saw was different, because his was an expression of pure shock and awe, followed by his usual olympian speed (marathon runners, martial arts since age 5) tho while i was mesmerized, he only traveled about 4 to 5 feet, and seemed to move yet i could not see him getting away from me at all, the gate we where standing at measured around 7 feet tall by almost 15 or more wide, cyclone fence welded to l frame metal held up my a pole on welded indistrial hinges, and the opposite side assisted by a thick guide wire , to pull and protect the build from sagging, on the business end was a square pillar 2 foot by 2 foot by about 7.5 or 8 feet, not ornate, the thing was heavy, gravity pulled it open and allowed to be closed by effort to swing it close again without incredible, but considerate effort on our part, (task to teach us teamwork) at the point my mind absorbed the fact that a stranger was looking and talking to us, i remembered my mother's words about talking to strangers, as i remembered those words the woman in the metallic clothing, her voice whispered into my mind to not be afraid, but my fear was already in gear, not because of her, but of what the punishment might be for allowing a stranger to approach the property and so freely speak to us (overly strict childhood) we feared my stepfather more than any childhood imagined monster or movie could conceive, as my heart lept in panic, i felt my body release the hold that frozen me in place with warm delight,  the padlock that i held the key for, not only opened by itself and buckled making the chain fall limp, but the u shaped lock section, came completely undone from the lock block, and again i felt the words don't go/fear,  my recollection fails me after this point, it becomes spotty and fractioned, i remember running behind my younger brother, feeling like our lives might depend on how fast we could muster speed to return to our parents, fear feeding my speed, making every muscle explode in pain and effort, while my brother's image flashed on and off in front of me like a blur, hot, cold, then hot again, when we returned to the residence i realized i was much farther behind than my younger brother, my mother and stepfather, had been waiting for us, they asked us what took us so long, which it took years for me to understand what that question might mean (lost time?), after that even, my mother tried several ways to make us explain what we saw, my brother shut in, still today his recollection of childhood events is spotty, where as for me my memory of those times is acute, im cursed with flashback like events, several times after that, my mother and i would be late sitting on the swing, talking about reader's digest articles and we see strange lights, one time a small light traveling faster than anything ever! leaving no lines, and with no flash, made a 90 degree turn without loosing any speed before disappearing apparently outbound(up), at first i thought it was a shooting star, as we watched it and i made a wish, it veered direction, my mother gasped and we very fast like went indoors, i understood the concept of ufo, at age 12, not because of the movies. there was all manner of silent floaters in the night sky in the republic of panama, west of the now closed howard air base in panama. my brother refuses to speak of the things he has seen even today.

of course, i tried tell our parents, my mother tried, my stepfather ridiculed us and put us through corporal punishment for making up stories, my grandmother advised to try to forget, or i would go insane, im 39 years old now, talking about something that happened between 10 and 12,  im haunted, every time i watch ancient alines and hangar one,  because i feel i have a story to add, but have kept it closed, for fear of ridicule and financial ruin, im still as afraid as ever, each key stroke here is done with my heart hanging on my throat.
content.summary: Sphere around 11 foot tall, floating inches off ground on a gradient, on the other side of an 8 foot tall syclone fense built hanging/swing gate, almost unperseptive hum, steamy fog , surrounded by denser fog around a 15 foot area separated from object.
